DOC.brief_summary: Subjects undergo history , examination , lung function assessment inform consent obtain . All subject undergo ventilation-perfusion scan . If first scan normal undergo second final scan four week later . If abnormal undergo two scan either nebulized bronchodilator nebulized saline prior second third scan . Each time repeat lung function test prior scan . We examine regional change ventilation perfusion relationship lung function .
